ActorTalk: Well done, [PlayerName]. The Commercial Square's progress has gone far beyond expectations. At this rate, the development plan will be done in no time.
To move into the next phase, we'll need to invite more business owners to join the committee. But there's no rush.
Just now, Inn Elite Department Store applied to join the committee. When you get a chance, take a walk around the square's inner ring and see how the initial construction turned out.
Several shops have already opened in the outer ring. After your inspection, try inviting them to join the committee as well.
If anything comes up, contact me anytime. You've got this!
